means: 使伤残（invalid的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: He was invalided out of the army because of the wounds he received.
A plague invalided half of the population in the town.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个城镇一半的人口患上了瘟疫.

sentence.Network_en: Of the 185 firemen, sixty were invalided home because of burns.
sentence.Network_cn: 在185个消防队员中, 有60人囚烧伤而被遣送回家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He was invalided by an illness that first afflicted his joints ., 他因一种疾病而致残 , 这种疾病最初折磨着他的关节.
